name: Sick Nick (Demo)
description:
Hello, Welcome to Sick-Nick. Its fps! Aslo you have to kill the sick blops and unlock areas to beat your score wich is the timer!

-Made with unity

-Windows/Linux

-Requirs Unzip or different  zips

-Requirs 64 BIT/86_64

-Early Access 

Thank you!

Small game, but im working on new episodes and levels if you press next level it won't transfer you there. For now beat your score! (WARNINIG)
